column5: Does anyone know how to mount 360 imaging from Hummingbird on a Terrova electric motor? It appears the bracket is designed to fit the cable style electric motors not the wired motors units. I am looking at purchasing 360 imaging for the front of my boat but I don't want to have to take it off and remount every time I stow and deploy the electric motor.

I dunno how that's going to be possible..  Even if you could, when you turn the motor, what's going to happen to the image?  On the Fortrex or Maxxum models only the inner shaft of the trolling motor turns, the outer sleeve stays stationary.  You need something that's going to keep the 360 orientated properly at all times.
Call the Minnkota customer service line.  I've always received the answers I was looking for to all my trolling motor questions whenever I called.
Don't buy it, it's a total waste of money!
